articles.title: Pawan Kalyan takes charge as Andhra Pradesh deputy chief minister | Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pawan Kalyan will handle the panchayat raj and rural development, rural water supply, environment and forests, and science and technology portfolios. | Latest News India
articles.content:
Actor-politician Pawan Kalyan took charge as Andhra Pradesh deputy chief minister in Vijaywada on Wednesday. Pawan Kalyan took charge at a ceremony accompanied by Vedic chants.

articles.description: The all-new, fourth-generation 2025 BMW X3 gets a fresh look, a tech-packaged cabin, and hybrid engines. It goes on sale this in the US later this year.
